DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: Prop . 13 -- Sunday ' s editorial on the gubernatorial race mistakenly stated that Prop . 13 could be repealed by a two-thirds vote of the people . In fact , Prop . 13 could be repealed by a simple majority by either initiative or referendum . But a referendum first would require a two-thirds vote of both houses in the Legislature to be placed on the ballot .
